title: How to Make Vegan Scalloped Potatoes

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (190 °C) and oil a baking pan.
Sauté the onions and turmeric in the oil over medium heat in a medium saucepan until the onions become soft (about 5 minutes).
Add the flour into the onions and stir for 2 minutes to thicken the mixture, making sure it has no lumps of flour in it.
Add in the remaining ingredients gradually.
Place the potatoes on the baking pan.
Pour the sauce onto the potatoes and bake without a cover for 45 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 375 °F (190 °C) and oil a baking pan.  Sauté the onions and turmeric in the oil over medium heat in a medium saucepan until the onions become soft (about 5 minutes).  Add the flour into the onions and stir for 2 minutes to thicken the mixture, making sure it has no lumps of flour in it. Set aside. Add in the remaining ingredients gradually.  Place the potatoes on the baking pan.  Pour the sauce onto the potatoes and bake without a cover for 45 minutes.  Finished.
